participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, she enjoys expressing herself through painting and horseback riding.
participant_1.background: My bedroom is purple and lime green. I will graduate from high school in two years. I am a vegan. I like riding horses. I have brown curly hair.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, he is dedicated to his family and enjoys the simple pleasures of country life.
participant_2.background: I am an electrician. I work my parents farms. I only listen to country music. I have a pet cow.

content.text: Hello, I'm participant_2. Nice to meet you.
What do you do for fun?
I like to ride horses, I also like to paint.
That's cool, I like to listen to country music and work on my parents farm.
That's cool too, what's your favorite country music artist?
My favorite country music artist is Garth Brooks.
He's great, I love his music too.
Me too, have you ever been to a Garth Brooks concert?
No, I haven't but I would love to go one day.
They're amazing, you should definitely go see one if you can.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem, it's always nice to meet someone who likes country music.
Same here, it's not too common where I live.
I know what you mean, I live in a small town so there's not a lot of people who listen to country music.
Well, it's nice to meet you, participant_1.
